Key Match Events: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father-son duo to play together in NBA history during the Lakers' preseason game against the Phoenix Suns on October 7, 2024.
Post-Match Reflections: LeBron James expressed pride in sharing the moment with his son and highlighted the importance of the experience for both of them and their family.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bronny James turned 20 years old on the same day and the Lakers celebrated him with a cake and cupcakes before the game.
